% This Document is a real bare document. The Document is generated by using some
% Commands:
% * \Building
% * \Room
% * \Event
% * \Area
% * \Floor
%
% The Output File is A4 Landscape
\documentclass[a4paper]{article}
\usepackage{vsl}
\usepackage[top=10mm, bottom=0mm, left=0mm, right=0mm, landscape]{geometry}

\renewcommand\Room{Seminarraum 2-7}
\renewcommand\Event{Logic Colloquium}
\renewcommand\Area{6}
\renewcommand\Floor{04}

\begin{document}

\printVSL[Stiege]

\end{document}
